Articles.Content:
My computer can't handle Arma, i quit the game far earlier due to lag.

The next poster is in the same universe i used my Vacuum Metastability bomb. That universe then gets destroyed with them in it!

I get to a parallel universe with no bomb 0.0000001 seconds before the bomb goes off.

The next poster is most wanted in all countries.

I'm out in my underwater base in the middle of the Atlantic ocean. Technically, not a country.

The next poster has deeply offended Chuck Norris.

I step on him in a jeager

the next poster is sat on when I power it down.

I teleport into the cockpit and kill you to death. For EVER.

The next poster sees a skeleton pop out!

*click-click* nope. not today.

next poster is behind the Skelton when I try my "innovative solution"

Turns out, there was no ammo.

The next poster is wiped out by Kim Jong-Un's super duper ultra mega 1337 battledroid of death!

It fails like a korean ICBM.

the next poster is next to it when it explodes

Fortunately, "next to" does not imply "not in a bunker", and the thing has no plutonium in it anyway.

I deploy a Homing Comfy Chair, lock it onto the next poster and press the big red button.

I am sitting in the chair.

next poster is locked onto by a malfunctioning spark nanobot prototype believing them to be a Nianian robot. to control on the way to a warzone. the "warzone" is actually a pie machine, but it does not know this and is going to walk you right into it.

I cannot very into... But emp?

The next poster is buried alive in the Challenger Deep.

Since this is in Minecraft, i simple tunnel my way up the trench and escape.

I lure a creeper to explode next to the next poster!

Edited January 5, 2015 by Souper

I was in creative mode and killed the creeper.

I then punch the next poster into the void and made sure he/she/it was in adventure mode.

I perform the Ritual of Cross-Game Summoning (consume three pints of CPU cooling fluid and then speak the name of the game you wish to summon from in binary code) and summon a rocket from KSP to carry me back to ground level.

The next poster is standing on the ground at the point where I break through to the surface.

Edited January 4, 2015 by Vaporo

I magically know it's going to happen, and simply jump out of the way in time.

The next poster is tasty, and attempts to eat themselves!

The last poster's definition of tasty is different to mine.

The next poster is struck by lightning. Luckily, the poster was in a Faraday pouch. The poster, without foresight, asphyxiates in the pouch.

I die.

the next poster also dies for some reason.

Alternate Universe Me knows this will happen and travels to save me.

The user below me is hated by all console players.

i put earmuffs on and escape on a Soyuz

The user below me is convinced that the Illuminati exists.

I'm a part of Anonymous, i help take it down.

The next poster tries to play Shores of Hazeron on a crappy 2GB RAM computer. Said computer explodes and lights their house on fire.

shores of hazeron no longer exists.

next player is about to explode. there is no way to prevent this, but you can take other people out as well.

I teleport everyone in the world to my current location the nanosecond I explode.

Next poster has to survive.

Edited January 6, 2015 by Bacon_commando

I am not in the world, because I am on the moon.

next poster just lost a spacesuit.

I am on my biodome on Mars, didn't need one.

Next poster is being chased in their dreams by Freddy Kreuger.

I wake up.

The next poster is chained to a chair in the path of a landing 747.
